h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Location
content: If you haven't finished the Chapter yet, continue with the story and go back to the Emerald Hall afterward to find the Spirit. Run straight through the Hall from the nearby Keeper's Shrine and around the corner to the left. You will find the giant iron ball lodged in a cliff. You can collect the Spirit from there.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Location'.
The content is as follows:
If you haven't finished the Chapter yet, continue with the story and go back to the Emerald Hall afterward to find the Spirit. Run straight through the Hall from the nearby Keeper's Shrine and around the corner to the left. You will find the giant iron ball lodged in a cliff. You can collect the Spirit from there.
